name: Messerschmidt's Reaver
flavorText: This mighty weapon once hewed its way through the demon-infested catacombs beneath the old Zakarum cathedral in Tristram. Could it be the weapon the warrior Aidan used to defeat Diablo all those years ago?
flavorTextHtml: This mighty weapon once hewed its way through the demon-infested catacombs beneath the old Zakarum cathedral in Tristram. Could it be the weapon the warrior Aidan used to defeat Diablo all those years ago?

secondary.textHtml: +[9142 - 13,371] Life after Each Kill
Reduce the remaining cooldown of one of your skills by 1 second when you slay an enemy. 1
secondary.text: Reduce the remaining cooldown of one of your skills by 1 second when you slay an enemy. 1
